detectors.description:
YearnRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnRewards__18.sol#731-747) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnRewards__18.sol#737)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnRewards__18.sol#740)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YearnRewards__18.sol#L740)
